name: Virtual Skydiving
description: Feel the thrill and fear of leaping from a plane in this VR Skydiving Simulator, Fall through the clouds and pull your chute for a safe landing. Land near the flare for max Points!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4690 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 Storage: 2 GB available space
